title: EastEnders spoilers: Lisa Fowler worries Louise and Keanu with explosive revelation
text:

It's set to be a tough couple of months for Louise and Keanu on EastEnders .

With exciting, loved-up plans for the future and a bundle of joy on the way, the couple are in for a shock when Louise's mum Lisa Fowler suggests they all leave Albert Square behind and move away.

The pair have to decide whether their future with their new arrival lies in Walford or abroad, after Lisa explains that she wants them all to make an exciting fresh start in sunny Portugal.

(Image: BBC)

It will be no surprise to viewers that Keanu is unconvinced by the idea and pushes for them to stay in the UK, while Louise will have to choose whether to side with her mum's idea or stick with her boyfriend.

There’s a lot keeping Keanu in Walford, especially the fact that Sharon Mitchell is secretly carrying his unborn child.

This Christmas, soap fans will see the 'Sheanu' secret exposed' as uncovered in explosive scenes.

Danny Walters, who plays Keanu, spoke to Digital Spy at the Inside Soap Awards about the infamous secret.

(Image: BBC)

He said: "The whole Sheanu story has been bubbling for a long, long time. It's about to get much more serious, much more darker and much more interesting – to watch, to perform and to be a part of.

"It's going to be a fantastic Christmas. It's explosive, big emotions, big stunts – like good, classic Christmas EastEnders style."

While Sharon Mitchell and Keanu Taylor’s affair is yet to be discovered, we can't wait for the secret to be exposed.

(Image: BBC)

Phil Mitchell knows Sharon is pregnant with presumably his child, he has no idea about her recent affair with son-in-law Keanu Taylor.

It’s awkward given Keanu is engaged to Phil’s daughter Louise, and they’re also expecting a child together.

The Louise and Keanu relationship has been complex with the pair forced to go into hiding when Ben framed Keanu for the attack on Phil, but they soon returned to the Square and couldn't keep away from the drama when Louise was taken hostage and Keanu got shot.

Maybe the move abroad will be a move away from the drama for the couple?

(Image: BBC)

Just last month, the couple ran to Louise's mum Lisa for help but after some time away, the trio are now living back on the Square.

However ever since their return to EastEnders , Phil has been keeping a close eye on the pregnant teen and Lisa hasn't been happy.

Cast members Danny and Max Bowden, who play Keanu and Ben Mitchell on the soap, have begun teasing the Christmas reveal.

The pair both told Mirror Online that there would be "heart-wrenching" scenes, and that things would get "explosive" as Sheanu were finally found out.

The huge family betrayal sets the scene for one of the best EastEnders Christmas episodes and storylines of all time.

EastEnders airs the scenes on Lisa's Portugal revelations on Monday, October 21 at 8pm on BBC One.
description: Louise's mum leaves her and fiancé Keanu with a big decision to make as she suggests they all leave Albert Square and move to Portgual
